features: Explore the Charming Universe of Animal Blocks - This delightful stacking block set comprises 12 uniquely sized animals and 1 stable base in vibrant and vivid colors.

Captivating Animal Shapes - Uncover 12 distinct animal shapes with charming, minimalist designs. From sheep to pandas, these blocks depict a variety of animals, including a crocodile, hippo, elephant, rhino, and more.

Engage Young Minds with Brain-Boosting Games - Foster cognitive development by stimulating skills in stacking, pattern recognition, and exploring a vibrant spectrum of colors. These endlessly entertaining blocks enhance fine motor skills and ignite young imaginations. Whether mastering a horizontal challenge or letting creativity run wild, children will discover a world of endless play possibilities.

Child-Friendly Design - Our blocks feature a robust, chunky design that's ideal for small hands to grip and maneuver. Made from premium-quality wood, each block is coated with eco-friendly, water-based paint, guaranteeing your child's safety during playtime.

Gift the Joy of Learning - While playing with our stacking toys, your child's problem-solving skills will be stimulated, and their hand-eye coordination abilities will be enhanced. Why not allow children to learn while they play?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: This toy is a nice quality, but it was a challenge for all the people in our home from 3-41 yrs old. I bought it for the 3 yr old and he plays with the pieces, but can in no way balance them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Terrible toddler toy
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited about the non-toxic paint and the idea of dexterity challenge. However, it shows all these pictures of the toy stacked and I think they must have glued them on, lol. Adults took on the challenge and never succeeded. Pieces themselves are awfully small for small toddlers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice but pieces are really small, going to return it.
